Mohamed Salah’s history at the World Cup: Play-off heartache & injury pain for Egypt talisman. Mohamed Salah’s history

The Liverpool superstar has only graced one global showpiece in his career to date, and even that outing was impacted by fitness problems. Mohamed Salah’s performances at club level with Liverpool have allowed him to cement a standing among the global elite, but the Egypt international is yet to make a telling contribution for his country on a World Cup stage.
